From: Hrishikesh Oturkar <hrishikesh.oturkar@nascodubai.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: Savio Salvador D'costa <Savio.Dcosta@nascodubai.com>; Prashant Jha <Prashant.Jha@nascodubai.com>

Date: 2025-07-01 08:32
Subject: Meeting Today - Transition and Renewal
--------------------------------------------------
CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe.

Dear Hagop

 

As discussed, we will visit your office around 11.30 AM. The purpose of the visit is

 

1.         to introduce you to Prashant Jha who will take over from Savio who is migrating to UK 

2.         Discuss the upcoming renewal – 23rd September

3.         Any other pending issue.

 

Looking forward to seeing you.

 

Regards

 

 

Hrishikesh Oturkar 

Director - General Insurance





Nasco Middle East
P.O. Box 62528, Dubai, UAE
T +971 4 351 4292  F +971 4 351 4291  D +971 4 305 1640

M +971 56 115 3718  E Hrishikesh.Oturkar@nascodubai.com <mailto:Hrishikesh.Oturkar@nascodubai.com> 
www.nascomiddleeast.com <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/M3UiCrMz4T7qV7ofzhGi4uo3h?domain=nascodubai.com/>

ID: CPOACUK_01
From: Hrishikesh Oturkar <hrishikesh.oturkar@nascodubai.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: Savio Salvador D'costa <Savio.Dcosta@nascodubai.com>; Prashant Jha <Prashant.Jha@nascodubai.com>; Diana Haydar <Diana.Haydar@nascodubai.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2025-07-02 11:10
Subject: RE: Meeting Today - Transition and Renewal
--------------------------------------------------
CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن


Dear Hagop

 

Thanks for your time yesterday. Always a pleasure meeting you.

 

As discussed in the meeting, I am formally writing to you of change of personnel at Nasco Middle East. Savio D’Costa who served as your point of contact for all client management activities over the past few years has decided to move to the UK to be with his family. While it is sad to see him go; we are pleased to welcome Prashant Kumar Jha as the new Head of P&C at Nasco Middle East Insurance Brokers LLC, who joined us a month ago and is taking over from Savio.

metadata.doc_id: CPOACUK - meeting today - transition and renewal\Conversation.txt
metadata.doc_path: C:\Users\ASUS\Desktop\Outlook\CPOACUK - meeting today - transition and renewal\Conversation.txt

chunks.text:
As discussed in the meeting, I am formally writing to you of change of personnel at Nasco Middle East. Savio D’Costa who served as your point of contact for all client management activities over the past few years has decided to move to the UK to be with his family. While it is sad to see him go; we are pleased to welcome Prashant Kumar Jha as the new Head of P&C at Nasco Middle East Insurance Brokers LLC, who joined us a month ago and is taking over from Savio.

 

Prashant brings with him 14 years of experience in the insurance and broking industry, with a strong track record in P&C Broking, Client Management and Retention. Prior to joining us, he has held various roles in leading multinational insurance brokers and demonstrated his ability to build with both clients & partners.

 

I am confident that Prashant’ experience will be of immense value to us and will contribute positively towards managing your risk & insurance. Prashant’s contact details are as follows

 

Prashant Jha

Head of P&C

T +971 4 351 4292  F +971 4 351 4291  D +971 4 305 1661

M +971 54 245 8555  E Prashant.Jha@nascodubai <mailto:Prashant.Jha@nascodubai> .com  



 

Should you need any assistance or clarifications, please do not hesitate to contact us at any time. Needless to say, Diana and Myself, we are always around to assist.

 

Regards

 

 

 

Hrishikesh Oturkar 

Director - General Insurance





Nasco Middle East
P.O. Box 62528, Dubai, UAE
T +971 4 351 4292  F +971 4 351 4291  D +971 4 305 1640

Dear Hagop

 

Thanks for your time yesterday. Always a pleasure meeting you.

 

As discussed in the meeting, I am formally writing to you of change of personnel at Nasco Middle East. Savio D’Costa who served as your point of contact for all client management activities over the past few years has decided to move to the UK to be with his family. While it is sad to see him go; we are pleased to welcome Prashant Kumar Jha as the new Head of P&C at Nasco Middle East Insurance Brokers LLC, who joined us a month ago and is taking over from Savio.

 

Prashant brings with him 14 years of experience in the insurance and broking industry, with a strong track record in P&C Broking, Client Management and Retention. Prior to joining us, he has held various roles in leading multinational insurance brokers and demonstrated his ability to build with both clients & partners.
